Package bio.singa.core.events

Interface UpdateEventEmitter<EventType>

  • Type Parameters:
    EventType - Thy Type of Event that is emitted.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GraphEventEmitter, NodeEventEmitter, TimeStepManager
    public interface UpdateEventEmitter<EventType>
    An interface for the observed part of the observer pattern without the need to extend a class such as the Observable class. It requires the implementing class to provide a CopyOnWriteArrayList to store the UpdateEventListener.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods
